description: You know it’s gonna be a good ski day (or night) when you’ve got Merino socks on your feet. Our Ski Full Cushion Midnight Ski Pattern Over the Calf Socks deliver everything you need to stay on the slopes day to night, without wearing out your feet: enhanced durability, breathability, and a dialed-in, performance-ready fit.
name: Smartwool Ski Full Cushion Midnight Ski Pattern Over The Calf Socks - Mens

specs.value: 63% Merino Wool 10% Nylon 25% Recycled Nylon 2% Elastane
